title: Ein witziger Tag im Park
translation: Max puts on his roller skates and goes to the park. He sees an advertisement for new glasses. His glasses are old, and today his face looks especially cheeky. Max tries a cake, but it is tasteless, so he adds a lot of sweetener. A friend tells a funny story. Everyone laughs. Playing with the roller skates gives Max a lot of enjoyment. The new advertisement appeals to him, and later he buys modern glasses.
